content: फलं [फल्-अच्] {@--1@} Fruit (<ab>fig.</ab> also) as of a tree; उदेति पूर्वं कुसुमं ततः फलं <ls>Ś. 7. 30</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 33</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 49.</ls> {@--2@} Crop, produce; कृषिफलं <ls>Me. 16.</ls> {@--3@} A result, fruit, consequence, effect; अत्युत्कटैः पापपुण्यैरिहैव फलमश्नुते <ls>H. 1. 83</ls>; फलेन ज्ञास्यसि <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; न नवः प्रभुराफलोदयात् स्थिरकर्मा विरराम कर्मणः <ls>R. 8. 22</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 33.</ls> {@--4@} (Hence) Reward, recompense, meed, retribution (good or bad); फलमस्योपहासस्य सद्यः प्राप्स्यसि पश्य मां <ls>R. 12. 37.</ls> {@--5@} A deed, an act (<ab>opp.</ab> words); ब्रुवते हि फलेन साधवो न तु कंठेन निजोपयोगितां <ls>N. 2. 48</ls> ‘good men prove their usefulness by deeds, not by words’. {@--6@} Aim, object, purpose; परेंगितज्ञानफला हि बुद्धयः <ls>Pt. 1. 43</ls>; किमपेक्ष्य फलं <ls>Ki. 2. 21</ls> ‘with what object in view’; <ls>Me. 54.</ls> {@--7@} Use, good, profit, advantage; जगता वा विफलेन किं फलं <ls>Bv. 2. 61.</ls> {@--8@} Profit or interest on capital. {@--9@} Progeny, offspring; <ls>R. 14. 39.</ls> {@--10@} A kernel (of a fruit). {@--11@} A tablet or board (शारिफल). {@--12@} A blade (of a sword). {@--13@} The point or head of an arrow, dart &c.; barb; <ls>Mu. 7. 10.</ls> {@--14@} A shield. {@--15@} A testicle. {@--16@} A gift. {@--17@} The result of a calculation (in <ab>Math.</ab>). {@--18@} Product or quotient. {@--19@} Menstrual discharge. {@--20@} Nutmeg. {@--21@} A ploughshare. {@--22@} Loss, disadvantage. {@--23@} The second term in a rule-of-three sum. {@--24@} Correlative equation. {@--25@} The area of a figure. {@--26@} The three myrobalans (त्रिफला). {@--27@} A point on a die.
